content: प्रफुल्ल {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Full-blown, blossoming, blooming; न हि प्रफुल्लं सहकारमेत्य वृक्षांतरं काक्षति षट्पदाली <ls>R. 6. 69</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 29</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 45</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Expanded or dilated like a full-blown flower (as eyes). {@--3@} Smiling. {@--4@} Shining. {@--5@} Gay, cheerful, pleased.
